resources.string: Input Unit for the current course.\n(Check your course form to be sure)
Input score as grade for the current course.\neach grade has an equivalent score.\n(A = 5), (B = 4),(C = 3), (D = 2), (E = 1), (F = 0)
Repeat Step 1 to 3, to add all course.
Click the "COMPUTE GPA" button to get the GPA calculation.\n(to be used after all course has being added)
The GPA screen outputs the current semester\'s GPA\nThe CGPA screen outputs all computed semester\'s GPA
